name: EMA Tech.
tagline: Audio, video, music and media projects
body:
### Welcome to EMA Tech's GitHub Pages.
I — Raphaël Doursenaud (@rdoursenaud) — host my humble audio, video and media related projects here.

Most are experiments, works in progress or proof of concepts.

The name comes from an old company I founded and folded.

I just can't let it go because this is where my passion lies.

Here's a selection of my current interests:

### [HiQontrol](https://github.com/ematech/hiqontrol)
A desktop and mobile application to control Soundcraft's Si series mixing consoles.

### [BBS1](https://github.com/ematech/bbs1)
A desktop application to program and edit Peterson's BBS1 metronome.

### [PMA (Performing Musician Assistant)](https://github.com/ematech/pma)
A desktop and mobile application for performing musicians to keep songs and setlists informations handy.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
